pages.text: $(li)The Gravelly Mountains are a variant of the Mountains biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The Gravelly Mountains are a variation of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l), they are composed of mostly Gravel, Dirt and Stone.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Gravelly Mountains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
